fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
-Convert one person into a Coven Locust
-If you have the locustnomicon, you kill a person in addition to your convert.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-At night one, it will be announced that their are only 2 nights till the locusts receive the locustnomicon!
-At night 3, it will be announced that the locusts have received the locustnomicon! One random locust will then gain it.
-Locusts you convert do not gain the above attributes.
-You bypass all conversion immunity

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Convert everybody who shall oppose you!
